Barbarian Puppet.description: Summons a pack of raged Barbarians

Rage Vial.description: Casts Rage on the Barbarian King, increasing damage and movement speed while boosting health recovery

Earthquake Boots.description: Causes a powerful earthquake which destroys Walls and damages Buildings

Vampstache.description: Every time the Barbarian King attacks, he heals himself

Giant Gauntlet.description: Barbarian King becomes gigantic, doing area damage and taking less damage

Spiky Ball.description: Shoots a Spiky Ball which bounces between buildings

Snake Bracelet.description: Summons snakes that fight by your side when taking damage

Stick Horse.description: Gallop over walls and get increased movement and attack speed after being deployed

Archer Puppet.description: Summons a gang of invisible Archers

Invisibility Vial.description: Turns the Queen invisible and gives her stronger attacks

Giant Arrow.description: Shoots a giant piercing arrow that crosses the entire village

Frozen Arrow.description: Icy arrows slow down the targets they hit

Magic Mirror.description: Summons clones of the Archer Queen

Action Figure.description: Summons a Giant Giant to fight by the Archer Queen's side

Eternal Tome.description: Grand Warden and all nearby friendly units become immune to damage

Life Gem.description: Nearby friendly units gain extra hitpoints

Rage Gem.description: Nearby friendly units do extra damage

Healing Tome.description: Heals the Grand Warden and all nearby friendly units

Fireball.description: Throws a giant exploding fireball at the closest defense

Lavaloon Puppet.description: Summons Lavaloons that target Air Defenses and drop bombs

Heroic Torch.description: Gives nearby Troops a burning desire to walk through Walls, move faster, and take less damage

Royal Gem.description: Heals the Royal Champion by an extra large amount

Seeking Shield.description: Throws her shield which bounces between defenses, dealing damage

Hog Rider Puppet.description: Summons a stampede of Hog Riders

Haste Vial.description: Casts Haste on the Royal Champion

Rocket Spear.description: Her next few spear throws are stronger and longer-ranged

Electro Boots.description: Periodically damages everything around the Royal Champion

Frost Flake.description: Flings flakes at the closest Defenses to freeze them

Henchmen Puppet.description: Summons flying bodyguards to support the Minion Prince

Dark Orb.description: Damages and slows down everything it touches

Metal Pants.description: Creates a protective barrier that blocks almost all damage temporarily

Noble Iron.description: Increases the speed, range, and power of the Minion Prince's first few attacks

Dark Crown.description: Boosts health and damage a total of 3 times when allies are defeated

Meteor Staff.description: Summons mysterious meteors that repeatedly strike the nearest Defense
